summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Project Proposal system. Both backend APIs and frontend UI are working excellently with full workflow integration including ARRIS AI insights generation, admin review, and automatic project creation.

minor_issues.issue: Request timeout after 10 seconds during ARRIS insights regeneration
minor_issues.impact: Minor - AI service takes longer than timeout, but initial generation works fine

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Minor - still correctly denies access, just different HTTP status code

minor_ui_issues.issue: Some dropdown option selection has overlay interception issues
minor_ui_issues.workaround: Form still functional, alternative selection methods work

minor_ui_issues.impact: Normal behavior - sessions expire for security

passed_tests: API endpoint GET /api/proposals/form-options returns platforms, timelines, priorities, statuses, and ARRIS question
API endpoint POST /api/proposals creates new proposal in draft status
API endpoint POST /api/proposals/{id}/submit generates ARRIS AI insights successfully
ARRIS insights have proper structure: summary, strengths, risks, recommendations, milestones, resources
API endpoint GET /api/proposals returns list of proposals with proper authentication
API endpoint GET /api/proposals/{id} returns proposal with ARRIS insights
API endpoint PATCH /api/proposals/{id} updates proposal status (approve/reject)
API endpoint GET /api/proposals/stats/summary returns proposal statistics
Proposal approval creates new project in projects collection (P-f23f created)
Memory Palace integration provides user context for ARRIS insights
Admin login works with default credentials (admin@hivehq.com / admin123)
Admin Proposals page at /proposals loads with statistics dashboard
Proposal statistics display correctly (Total: 2, Submitted: 1, Approved: 1, High Priority: 2)
Proposal detail modal opens and shows comprehensive information
Details tab displays: title, description, goals, platforms, timeline, hours, ARRIS intake response
ARRIS Insights tab is accessible and functional
Assigned project ID displayed after approval (P-f23f)
New Proposal button opens proposal form with all required fields
Form validation works - buttons disabled when required fields empty, enabled when filled
Platform selection works with clickable cards (YouTube, Instagram, Twitter tested)
Form fields accept input correctly (title, description, goals, ARRIS intake question)
Filter dropdowns functional for status and priority filtering
Navigation between proposals list and detail views works smoothly
Modal close functionality works correctly
Backend API integration working perfectly with frontend
ARRIS AI insight generation working with proper error handling
Complete proposal workflow: Draft → Submit → Review → Approve → Project Creation
Protected admin endpoints require authentication
Real-time statistics update correctly
